tasks.label: üìù Log Claude Session (Quick)
args: $project = Split-Path -Leaf $PWD; if (-not (Test-Path .claude-logs)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .claude-logs | Out-Null }; $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'; $desc = '${input:sessionDescription}'; Add-Content -Path .claude-logs\$project.md -Value "`n## $timestamp - $desc"; Write-Host "Logged to .claude-logs\$project.md" -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: üìã Log Claude Session (Detailed)
args: $project = Split-Path -Leaf $PWD; if (-not (Test-Path .claude-logs)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .claude-logs | Out-Null }; $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'; $desc = '${input:sessionDescription}'; $files = '${input:filesChanged}'; $status = '${input:sessionStatus}'; $logEntry = "`n## $timestamp`n**Description:** $desc`n**Files:** $files`n**Status:** $status`n`n### Changes`n"; Add-Content -Path .claude-logs\$project.md -Value $logEntry; try { git diff HEAD | Add-Content -Path .claude-logs\$project.md } catch { Add-Content -Path .claude-logs\$project.md -Value 'No git changes' }; Write-Host 'Detailed log saved' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: üîç View Current Project Log
args: $project = Split-Path -Leaf $PWD; $logPath = ".claude-logs\$project.md"; if (Test-Path $logPath) { Get-Content $logPath } else { Write-Host 'No log file found' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: üìä View All Project Logs
args: if (Test-Path .claude-logs) { Write-Host '=== Available Logs ===' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Get-ChildItem .claude-logs\*.md | Format-Table Name, Length, LastWriteTime; Write-Host '=== Recent Entries ===' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Get-ChildItem .claude-logs\*.md | ForEach-Object { Get-Content $_.FullName -Tail 20 } } else { Write-Host 'No logs directory' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: üöÄ Setup Auto-Logging (Git Hook)
args:
if (-not (Test-Path .git\hooks)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .git\hooks -Force | Out-Null }; $hookContent = @'
#!/bin/sh
project=$(basename "$PWD")
mkdir -p .claude-logs
echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') - Commit: $(git log -1 --pretty=%B)" >> .claude-logs/${project}.md
'@; Set-Content -Path .git\hooks\post-commit -Value $hookContent; Write-Host 'Auto-logging enabled' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: üíæ Commit & Log Claude Changes
args: $project = Split-Path -Leaf $PWD; if (-not (Test-Path .claude-logs)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .claude-logs | Out-Null }; git add -A; $msg = '${input:commitMessage}'; git commit -m $msg; $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'; Add-Content -Path .claude-logs\$project.md -Value "`n## $timestamp - $msg"; git diff HEAD~1 HEAD | Add-Content -Path .claude-logs\$project.md; Write-Host 'Committed and logged' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: üóëÔ∏è Clear Current Project Log
args: $project = Split-Path -Leaf $PWD; $logPath = ".claude-logs\$project.md"; if (Test-Path $logPath) { Remove-Item $logPath; Write-Host 'Log cleared' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host 'No log file' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: üì§ Export Log Summary
args: $project = Split-Path -Leaf $PWD; $logPath = ".claude-logs\$project.md"; if (Test-Path $logPath) { $summary = "Log Summary for $project`nGenerated: $(Get-Date)`n`n"; $summary += Get-Content $logPath -Tail 50 | Out-String; Set-Content -Path claude-summary.txt -Value $summary; Write-Host 'Summary exported' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host 'No log file' -ForegroundColor Red }

inputs.description: What did Claude do this session?
